resource_data:
"<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/76801</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>76801</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>40d170b4-5e48-41f3-29ed-24b95cc49d3b#1#3</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Ardaghi kehely, 8.század, Dublin, National Museum of Ireland, arany és aranyozott ezüst.</string>
            <string language="en">The Ardagh Chalice, 8th century, Dublin, National Museum of Ireland, gold, gilded silver.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Ardagh Chalice, 8. Jahrhundert, Dublin, 
nationales Museum von Irland, Gold, vergoldete Silber.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le Calice d'Ardagh, le 8ème siècle, 
Dublin, musée national de l'Irlande, or, a doré l'argent.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O Ardagh Chalice, 8o século, Dublin, museu 
nacional de Ireland, ouro, gilded a prata.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il Ardagh Chalice, l'ottavo secolo, Dublino, 
museo nazionale dell'Irlanda, oro, gilded l'argento.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο Ardagh κάλυκας, 8ος αιώνας, Δουβλίνο, εθνικό 
μουσείο της Ιρλανδίας, χρυσό, επιχρυσωμένο ασήμι.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El Ardagh Chalice, 8vo siglo, Dublín, museo 
nacional de Irlanda, oro, doró la plata.</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Az ír ötvösművészet egyik legszebb darabja, aranyfiligrándíszítéssel, kőberakásokkal díszített kehely</string>
            <string language="en">The one of the finest piece of the Irish goldsmith’s craft, with golden filigree ornament and stone marquetry</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">ír művészet,  inzuláris művészet,  ötvösség,  kehely,  filigrán,  </string>
            <string language="en">Irish art, insular art, goldsmith's art, chalice, filigree</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das des feinsten Stückes der irischen goldsmith?s 
Fertigkeit, mit goldener mit Filigran geschmückter Verzierung und 
Stein Marquetry</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Celui du morceau le plus fin du métier irlandais de 
goldsmith?s, avec la marqueterie en filigrane d'or d'ornement et de 
pierre</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Essa da parte a mais fina do ofício irish dos 
goldsmith?s, com o ornament e o marquetry filigree dourados da pedra</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Quello della parte più fine del mestiere irlandese dei 
goldsmith?s, con l'ornamento ed il marquetry a filigrana dorati della 
pietra</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα από το λεπτότερο κομμάτι της ιρλανδικής τέχνης 
goldsmith?s, με χρυσό filigree marquetry διακοσμήσεων και 
πετρών</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El que esta' del pedazo más fino del arte irlandés de 
los goldsmith?s, con el ornamento y el marquetry afiligranados de oro 
de la piedra</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Irische kunst, Inselkunst, kunst des Goldschmieds, 
chalice, mit Filigran geschmückt</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Art irlandais, art insulaire, l'art de l'orfèvre, 
calice, en filigrane</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Arte irish, arte insular, arte do goldsmith, chalice, 
filigree</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arte irlandese, arte insulare, arte dell'orafo, 
chalice, a filigrana</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ιρλανδική τέχνη, νησιωτική τέχνη, τέχνη του χρυσοχόου, 
κάλυκας, filigree</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Arte irlandés, arte insular, arte del orfebre, chalice,
afiligranado</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>image</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn:

end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>591</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
